A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie should have been titled "Star Wars: The Beginning of the End". I have been quite disappointed.

The humour in one of the first scenes fails in being funny and just shows how ridiculous this franchise is becoming. Disney is turning Star Wars into a joke and money machine\, using the Marvel recipe. A recipe that doesn't work and that mainly consists of overusing Special FX to cover the lack of depth in the story\, overuse of stupid jokes/humour\, and a shot of a shirtless guy (to give teenagers something to w**k on?).

Aborted plots and vilains (to develop and sell comics and novels maybe?) and new cute creatures (probably to sell toys).

At this rate\, I wouldn't be surprised to see the Guardians of the Galaxy showing up in Episode IX...

Loved Carrie Fisher's performance. Very emotional\, especially since a lot of lines take a double meaning after her death.
